name: I Shall Duel Thee At Dawn
name_original: I Shall Duel Thee At Dawn
description:
A competitive typing flintlock pistol duel for two players in local!
Hit the prompted keys when they flash to load your fiddly gun, and when the clock strikes noon, hit your corresponding CTRL key to fire!
Played on one keyboard with two players, so fight over the buttons to honour your duty!

Built for Ludum Dare 36, I Shall Duel Thee At Dawn is an experimental game put together in just under 48 hours. The game was then polished up over 2 months before its current release onto Itch. Due to some uncontrollable life events, the artist was never able to finish up on his initial designs and that cobbled with new projects taken on by the development team lead to the project being put on indefinite hold. Rather than sit on the project, Hidden Productions decided it would be better to release it to the world in its current state at no cost, so that others could see the work an maybe be inspired to try something new.
